text: SC Rotor Volgograd () is a Russian professional football club from the large city of Volgograd, Volgograd Oblast (formerly Stalingrad). They played at the top level of Soviet/Russian football either side of World War II from 1989 to 1990, and from 1991 to 2004. The team currently plays its home games at the Volgograd Arena since 2018. ==References== Category:1920s establishments in the Soviet Union Category:1929 establishments in Europe Category:Russian football clubs Category:Volgograd
title: FC Rotor Volgograd
